author: violet_black
post: Okay, I /think/ William is saying that the muscle/bone structure of the face in the Shroud doesn’t match that of Akiane’s painting, but with all the obscure references, it’s kind of hard to tell. All my attempts to google the concept of seven planet named body types bring up strange astrological treatises..
title: Akiane’s Jesus, Heaven is for Real and the Man in the Turin Shroud
